config_data.coppa_message: Mmm, it must be my birthday... Show me how many birthdays you got under your belt.

pierce.name: Jab
pierce.desc: Reduces effects that prevent damage by {x} when attacking.

strike.name: Punch
strike.desc: A random enemy {y} card takes {x} damage.

counter.name: Payback
counter.desc: Deals {x} damage to any card that attacks this, if this card survives.

weaken.name: Cripple
weaken.desc: Reduces attack of a random enemy {y} card by {x} for a turn.

weakenall.name: Cripple All
weakenall.desc: Reduces attack of all enemy {y} cards by {x} for a turn.

poison.name: Gas
poison.desc: Attacked enemy card takes {x} additional damage after each of their turns.

barrier.name: Shield
barrier.desc: Prevent {x} damage dealt to another random {y} card.

barrierall.name: Shield All
barrierall.desc: Prevent {x} damage dealt to other friendly {y} cards.

invigorate.name: Boost
invigorate.desc: Card gets +{x} attack whenever you play a combo.

outlast.name: Recover
outlast.desc: Gets +{x} max health whenever you play a combo

rally.name: Cheer
rally.desc: Increases attack of another random friendly {y} card by {x} for a turn. Only targets cards that have not attacked this turn.

rallyall.name: Cheer All
rallyall.desc: Increases attack of all other friendly {y} cards by {x} for a turn. Only targets cards that have not attacked this turn.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: Restore {x} health to another damaged {y} card.

healall.name: Heal All
healall.desc: Restore {x} health to all other friendly damaged {y} cards.

leech.name: Leech
leech.desc: Heals self for {x} after dealing attack damage to a card.

inspire.name: Motivate
inspire.desc: {y} cards adjacent to this get extra attack.

shrapnel.name: Bomb
shrapnel.desc: Deal {x} damage to {y} enemies adjacent to the one this attacks.

hijack.name: Hijack
hijack.desc: Steals up to {x} attack from each attack increase on the opposing enemy until next turn.

bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
bodyguard.desc: Prevent {x} damage from each skill that targets this card and adjacent allies. Uses the highest Bodyguard available.

give.name: Give
give.desc: Give a random card the {s} skill with {x} value.

scorch.name: Scorch
scorch.desc: Attacked enemy card takes {x} additional damage after each of their turns. This damage stacks with any Scorch damage already applied to a card.

empower.name: Empower
empower.desc: Increases attack of a random friendly {y} card by {x} for a turn. This skill can target itself.

poisonstrike.name: Gas Punch
poisonstrike.desc: A random enemy {y} card takes {x} damage, and {x} Gas is applied to the enemy card if the Punch deals damage.

fortification.name: Fortification
fortification.desc: Blocks {x} damage when attacked to this card and adjacent allies. Uses the highest Fortification available.

rupture.name: Rupture
rupture.desc: Half of {x} rounded up is added to this card's attack value.

awaken.name: Awaken
awaken.desc: Increases attack of a random friendly {y} card by {x} permanently. Only targets cards that have not attacked this turn.

poisonpierce.name: Gas Jab
poisonpierce.desc: Reduces effects that prevent damage by {x} when attacking and applies {x} Gas to the enemy card when damage is dealt.

shrapnelpierce.name: Bomb Jab
shrapnelpierce.desc: Reduces effects that prevent damage by {x} when attacking and deal {x} damage to {y} enemies adjacent to the one this attacks.

energize.name: Energize
energize.desc: This card and adjacent cards get +{x} attack whenever you play a combo.

vitalize.name: Vitalize
vitalize.desc: This card and adjacent cards get +{x} max health whenever you play a combo

inverse.name: Inverse
inverse.desc: The effects of Punch and Heal are swapped.

unity.name: Unity
unity.desc: If all cards in your deck have the same faction as your hero, they all get +25% HP.

singularity.name: Singularity
singularity.desc: Whenever you play a second copy of a card, its HP is reduced to 1.

9001.name: Scorch
9001.desc: The Gas skill on all cards is increased by 25%. Also, the Gas skill on all cards are evolved into the Scorch skill. When Scorch deals damage it stacks with any Scorch damage already applied to a card.

9002.name: Empower
9002.desc: The Cheer and Cheer All skills on all cards are evolved into the Empower skill. This skill works like Cheer except it can target itself.

9003.name: Gas Punch
9003.desc: The Punch skill on all cards are evolved into the Gas Punch skill. When Punch deals damage it also applies Gas to the enemy card it hits.

9004.name: Fortification
9004.desc: The Sturdy skill on all cards are evolved into the Fortification skill. Fortification applies Sturdy to that card and adjacent cards using the highest Fortification value available.

9005.name: Rupture
9005.desc: The Jab skill on all cards are evolved into the Rupture skill. Rupture adds 50% of it's value, rounded up, to a card's attack.

9006.name: Awaken
9006.desc: The Cheer and Cheer All skills on all cards are evolved into the Awaken skill. Awaken increases the attack of a random friendly card permanently.

9007.name: Gas Jab
9007.desc: The Jab skill on all cards are evolved into the Gas Jab skill. When a card with Jab deals damage it also applies Gas to the enemy card.

9008.name: Bomb Jab
9008.desc: The Jab skill on all cards are evolved into the Bomb Jab skill. When a card with Jab deals damage it also deals damage to the enemy cards adjacent to the one it attacks.

9009.name: Energize
9009.desc: The Boost skill on all cards are evolved into the Energize skill. Whenever you play a combo cards with Energize and adjacent cards to it get attack added for the Energize value.

9010.name: Vitalize
9010.desc: The Recover skill on all cards are evolved into the Vitalize skill. Whenever you play a combo cards with Vitalize and adjacent cards to it get health added for the Vitalize value.

9011.name: Protection
9011.desc: All cards gain the Bodyguard skill with a value of 99.

9012.name: Thievery
9012.desc: All cards gain the Hijack skill with a value of 99.

9013.name: Puncture
9013.desc: All cards gain the Jab skill with a value of 99.

9014.desc: If all cards in your deck have the same faction as your hero, they all get +25% HP.

9016.name: Singularity
9016.desc: Whenever you play a second copy of a card, its HP is reduced to 1.

9017.desc: The effects of Punch and Heal are swapped.

user_mail.subject: Skill and Card Bug Fixes
user_mail.message:
Hello Multiverse Beings, 

Mythic card traits have been added, and minor bug fixes have been applied for skills. Check the Technical Forums changelog thread on the Kongregate website or Help Center for more info. 

- DEVBOT

user_mail.message:

All Legendary and Mythic cards will receive an increase in stats soon. Check the General Forums for the stickied thread '[OFFICIAL] Legendary and Mythic Buffs' on the Kongregate website for more info.

user_mail.subject: Combo Mastery
user_mail.message:
It’s time to master a new feature in Animation Throwdown! Combo Mastery is here!

Combo Mastery is unlocked at level 12, and introduces combo unique Mastery Tokens. Using Mastery Tokens, you can level up a combo to make it even more powerful in combat!

Another new item, Mastery Stones, are earned from daily quests and events & these can be spent to get mastery tokens in the Mastery section of the shop.

We’ve included enough Mastery Stones for you to enjoy this new feature right away! We hope you continue to enjoy Animation Throwdown!

user_mail.subject: [OFFICIAL]  Notification Error with 2x Offer Wall special
user_mail.message:
Hello Everyone,

On Saturday, July 21 a notification went out in error to some players announcing a 2x Offer Wall special. We originally planned to hold a 2x offer wall special on that date, but it was rescheduled to July 28. The change was reflected in our sticky Current & Upcoming Events thread. 

We are deeply sorry for any confusion this may have caused and will send a mail message out to all players shortly.  Any offers that were started on July 21 will receive the Gem quantity that was shown on-screen for that offer. If you run into any issues with completing your offer, please contact support for more help.

As a reminder, here is the information on the official 2x Offer Wall special which will be this coming Saturday, July 28: 

Earn double Gems from the Offer Wall during this special
Starts July 28 at 17:00 PDT (July 29 at 1:00 GMT)
Ends July 29 at 17:00 PDT (July 30 at 1:00 GMT)
Offers must be *started* during the special
Offers can be *completed* at any time any offer-specific requirements will still apply
Offers that were started at a different date/time will not pay 2x gems, even if you finish it during the special event
The 2x gem quantity is what is displayed on screen (ex: if it reads “1,000 Gems,”  that is what you will receive)

user_mail.subject: Giggitywatt update!
user_mail.message:
Greetings multi-verse beings, we have an update on Giggitywatts for you!

Giggitywatt cards will no longer drop from Basic Packs, Buy Max Basic Packs, Rare Packs, Super Epic Packs, or Super Epic Packs x10. Instead, Giggitywatts will drop directly from the packs and immediately get added to the player's inventory. The Giggitywatts will drop in the same amounts and rate as they did previously. Any Giggitywatts earned from buying these packs will ignore the Giggitywatt cap.

In addition to this the base Giggitywatt cap has been increased by 5000 to a total of 10,000!
